title: 'Carrie Lam step down!' Hong Kong leader heckled in Legislative Council – video
text: Hong Kong leader Carrie Lam was forced to halt her annual policy address twice after pro-democracy lawmakers disrupted the session, shouting 'five demands, not one less' and calling for her to step down. Lam was due to announce a raft of property initiatives in a bid to restore confidence in her administration after more than four months of anti-government protests. Beijing-backed Lam, who has previously rejected calls for her to stand down, was due to present her third policy address amid escalating violence that has plunged the Chinese-ruled city into its biggest political crisis in decades
description: Hong Kong leader Carrie Lam was forced to halt her annual policy address twice after pro-democracy lawmakers disrupted the session, shouting 'five demands, not one less' and calling for her to step down
